comments:
This bug is also present in 3.1.1 and 3.1
On the key bindings preference page, select a key binding and hit the Edit button.  In the Key Sequence group, select all the text with your mouse, and attempt type into the name field (or hit Delete or select something from the drop down menu beside the text widget).  Nothing happens and you get the exception below.  I suppose this is happening because I am doing things that are not allowed?  If so, should there be some feedback to the user on the status line or something like that?

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: All triggers in a trigger sequence must be an instance of Trigger
